Name: Sig Sauer P226 Series
Description:
Introduces a line of SIG SAUER handguns for you to play with - with optic-ready slides.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CONTENTS

- SIG P226 (.40S&W and 9x19mm)
- SIG P226T (.40S&W and 9x19mm)
- SIG MK25 (.40S&W and 9x19mm)
- SIG MK25T (.40S&W and 9x19mm)
- Extended Magazines for .40S&W and 9x19mm SIG P226 series handguns

KNOWN ISSUES

9x19mm extended magazine only holds 15 rounds - uncertain what could be causing it, looking to fix ASAP.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CREDITS

- Nikpo (Texture editing for the MK25 series)
- Infinity Ward (Sounds from Modern Warfare 2019)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
